verbs.description: Robert Wilkie [V: has] served as the acting secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs since March 2018 -- and President Trump wants to make his position more permanent .

[ARG0: Robert Wilkie] has [V: served] [ARG1: as the acting secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs] [ARGM-TMP: since March 2018] -- and President Trump wants to make his position more permanent .
Robert Wilkie has served as the acting secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs since March 2018 -- and [ARG0: President Trump] [V: wants] [ARG1: to make his position more permanent] .
Robert Wilkie has served as the acting secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs since March 2018 -- and [ARG0: President Trump] wants to [V: make] [ARG1: his position more permanent] .
